title: Cameron Borthwick-Jackson returns to Manchester United from Leeds loan
description: Cameron Borthwick-Jackson has returned to Manchester United from his loan at Leeds.
content: The 20-year-old defender joined the Championship club last August but made only made six appearances for the Whites.Borthwick-Jackson made his Manchester United debut against West Bromwich Albion in November 2015 and has played 14 games for the club.However, Jose Mourinho did not involve Borthwick-Jackson in his pre-season plans.He has also represented England at various youth levels, winning caps for the U17s, U19s and U20s.
